heading: HR00056
0: RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEE ON ECONOMIC AFFAIRS AND THE COMMITTEE ON GOVERNMENT ENTERPRISES AND PRIVATIZATION AND THE COMMITTEE ON TRADE AND INDUSTRY TO CONDUCT A JOINT INQUIRY IN AID OF LEGISLATION TO CAUSE THE IMMEDIATE REVIVAL OF THE STEEL INDUSTRY IN THE PHILIPPINES THROUGH THE REOPENING OF THE NATIONAL STEEL CORPORATION IN ILIGAN CITY AND ITS FEASIBILITY TO BE DESIGNATED AND OPERATE AS A SPECIAL ECONOMIC ZONE
status: Pending with the Committee on TRADE AND INDUSTRY since 2019-11-27
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00056
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEE ON ECONOMIC AFFAIRS AND THE COMMITTEE ON GOVERNMENT ENTERPRISES AND PRIVATIZATION AND THE COMMITTEE ON TRADE AND INDUSTRY TO CONDUCT A JOINT INQUIRY IN AID OF LEGISLATION TO CAUSE THE IMMEDIATE REVIVAL OF THE STEEL INDUSTRY IN THE PHILIPPINES THROUGH THE REOPENING OF THE NATIONAL STEEL CORPORATION IN ILIGAN CITY AND ITS FEASIBILITY TO BE DESIGNATED AND OPERATE AS A SPECIAL ECONOMIC ZONE
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : SIAO, FREDERICK W.
DATE FILED : 2019-07-11
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
